1534470.name: Sherwood Extreme Co-Op Demo
1534470.description:
A co-op Crossbow Shooter with Bullet-Time Parkour! Race through levels and survival mode, chaining combos of slow-mo sniping and destruction to climb the leaderboards. Wishlist now!

Save the kingdom in Robin Hood's silliest adventure through colorful low-poly environments. Zip, swing, and soar through the air in slow-motion to rack up combos with all the 360 no-scopes and parkour action medieval times were known for.

KEY FEATURES

  • Swing, Flip, Kaboom! - Use zip-lines, swinging ropes, bouncy mushrooms, and cannons to move through the air at top speeds, exploding and sniping every goblin you come across.

  • Team Up in Co-Op - Grapple onto your friend's shoulders for piggy-back parkour! Complete challenges together and top the leaderboards with speed and precision mastery.

  • Upgrade Your Hero - Level up and collect shinies to unlock weapons, skills, and outfits. Execute your playstyle and make bold fashion statements on the battlefield!

  • Survive Horde Mode - Snipe endless waves of wacky enemies amidst a floating castle. Unlock powerups and animal mounts in Robin Hood's greatest challenge yet.

  • Laugh in Danger's Face - Discover silly secrets throughout Sherwood kingdom and earn higher scores by destroying goblins in the most ridiculous ways!

Wishlisting is the best and easiest way to help our indie game succeed!

@cagestudios on social media
